about.summary: An implementation of the XDG Sound Theme and Name Specifications

name: libcanberra
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "libcanberra" %}
{% set version = "0.30" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: http://0pointer.de/lennart/projects/libcanberra/libcanberra-{{ version }}.tar.xz
  sha256: c2b671e67e0c288a69fc33dc1b6f1b534d07882c2aceed37004bf48c601afa72

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [not linux]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - make
    - pkg-config
  host:
    - libvorbis
    - libtool
  run:
    - {{ pin_compatible("libvorbis") }}
    - {{ pin_compatible("libtool") }}

test:
  commands:
    - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libcanberra.so"

about:
  home: http://0pointer.de/lennart/projects/libcanberra/
  license: LGPL-v2.1
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: LGPL
  summary: 'An implementation of the XDG Sound Theme and Name Specifications'
  dev_url: http://git.0pointer.de/?p=libcanberra.git

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - scopatz
